alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Okeechobee; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued December 24 at 12:54PM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT... For the Freeze Warning tonight, duration of freezing temperatures of 2 to 4 hours expected. * WHERE...Osceola, Okeechobee, Inland Northern Brevard, Inland Indian River, Mainland Northern Brevard, Northern Brevard Barrier Islands, Inland Southern Brevard and Mainland Southern Brevard Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.
